metadata.synopsis: One-liner AD given by the narrator describing the inscription on a plaque next to one of the portals in Sorcerous Sundries. In this one a true statement is said about the nightsong is given to mark this portal as the right one to go through in the Sorcerous Sundries portal puzzle. This statement should be understood only y someone that knows about the true aasimar Nightsong.
